content: Hi, welcome to my website! I am a PhD candidate at the Swiss Finance Institute and University of Zurich. During my PhD, I worked on derivative and bond markets, bank capital and leverage regulations, as well as on the impact of FinTech on traditional banking. Previously, I was a consultant at Frontier Economics in London, where I specialized in Financial Services. Outside work, I enjoy martial arts and beautiful hikes.
